law.catch_line: Except as provided in § 7-402 of this subtitle, this subtitle applies to any acquisition, agreement...
law.text: Except as provided in § 7-402 of this subtitle, this subtitle applies to any acquisition, agreement, arrangement, or activity, including the acquisition of voting securities or assets, bulk reinsurance, and merger, that results in a person acquiring directly or indirectly the control of an authorized insurer.
